Input files.Ortho_photo_1_file_path_COMMENT: Select the first ortho photo you want to merge. The output folder will be placed next to this rasters parent folder
Input files.Ortho_photo_2_file_path_COMMENT: Select the second ortho photo you want to merge

Output options.Over-ride output folder name_COMMENT: Instead of using input's parent folders name it will use your name provided here

Parameters.Prefer centre factor_COMMENT:
When prefer_centre_factor is positive (e.g., greater than 1), the preference will lean more towards following centerline.
When prefer_centre_factor is negative (e.g., less than 1), the preference will lean more towards color similarity.
Parameters.Line sample points_COMMENT: Used to determine the direction of the line ends. If line ends are going off course reduce this number. If the middle of the line is misshapen increase this number

Beep when finished_COMMENT: This will alert you, to come back to the computer to continue processing.
